snippet: A Bronx woman was arrested on Saturday and accused of starting a fire in her apartment building that led to the death of her boyfriend and seriously injured several other apartment tenants.
abstract: Wendy Walston is charged with manslaughter and arson in the death of her boyfriend Thomas Galvin in the Bronx in September.
lead_paragraph: A Bronx woman was arrested on Saturday and accused of starting a fire in her apartment building that led to the death of her boyfriend and seriously injured several other apartment tenants.

headline.seo: Bronx Woman, 46, Charged With Starting Fire That Killed Her Boyfriend
